summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley, discussing financing issues related to a project. Andrew L. Farkas relays a message from Murray McCabe indicating that JPMorgan Chase is unwilling to provide financing due to balance sheet risks and other concerns.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email and is involved in discussions regarding financing.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email from Epstein, indicating a professional relationship.

persons.name: Andrew L. Farkas
persons.context: Farkas forwards a message regarding financing issues to Epstein and Staley.

persons.name: Murray McCabe
persons.context: McCabe is mentioned as having communicated the financing issues to Farkas.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are engaged in discussions regarding financing, indicating a professional relationship.
Farkas relays information from McCabe regarding JPMorgan's financing stance.
Farkas forwards a message to Epstein, indicating a professional connection.

keyFacts: JPMorgan Chase is unwilling to provide financing due to balance sheet risks.
Murray McCabe communicated that JPMorgan will not represent or finance anyone else.
The email contains confidential information and is intended for specific recipients only.
